text: An An (; 1986 - 21 July 2022) was a male giant panda. He lived in Hong Kong Ocean Park. He was a gift from the Central People's Government of China to the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region in 1999. He was the longest-living male giant panda in the world under human care before his death in 2022. An An was euthanised at aged 35 on 21 July 2022 at Hong Kong Ocean Park after being sick for the last three weeks. ==References== Category:1986 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Individual animals Category:Bears
title: An An (giant panda)
